possible_violations.violation_name: Violation of Codes of Conduct provisions

records.context_note: Two SC Officers deployed in JO Bulgaria Land 2024 did not report for duty on 2024-02-10 after being denied recuperation days. They were unreachable by communication channels. After sustained efforts, it was established they had left the operational area without reporting. This was considered a breach of duty and a violation of the Code of Conduct.
records.evidence_quote: SC Officers did not report for duty and left the OA without informing chain of command.
